data.Title: Google Ends Continuous Scroll in Search Results
data.Description: Google is dropping continuous scroll in search results. Continuous scroll launched in Google mobile search in October 2021 and on desktop in December 2022.

data.Title: Google Debunks SEO Myth: Branded Keywords Won't Hurt Rankings
data.Description: Google debunks SEO myth: Using branded keywords in content doesn't harm rankings.

data.Title: Google Search to Show More AI Overviews for Health Queries
data.Description: Google Search is showing more AI Overviews for health queries since pulling them back a few weeks ago.

data.Title: Google Updates Sitemap Documentation
data.Description: Google updated its sitemap document to add "The lastmod value should reflect the date and time of the last significant update to the page"

data.Title: Google is Testing New Sitelinks Formats and Designs
data.Description: Google is testing even more sitelinks formats/designs - blue/black text, arrows, pills, boxes - etc.

data.Title: Google to Launch AI-Powered Customizable Chatbots
data.Description: Google has been developing a product to create customizable chatbots, which could be modeled on celebrities, and plans to launch it as soon as 2024.

data.Title: Amazon Developing AI Chatbot "Metis" to Rival ChatGPT
data.Description: Amazon is working on an AI chatbot, codenamed Metis, designed to compete directly with ChatGPT. It's tentatively slated for a September launch. The chatbot would be accessed through a website and powered by an in-house AI model that will use RAG to generate up-to-date replies.

data.Title: Perion Network Announces Layoffs Following Revenue Hit
data.Description: Perion Network announced to lay off its 6% of the workforce due to cost-cutting measures. The Perion Network layoffs. announced due to Microsoft's pricing policy change, will affect around 35 employees.

data.Title: Google Search Introduces Credit Card Carousels and Widgets
data.Description: Google now shows credit card carousels and widgets, which can disrupt the credit card affiliate business.

data.Title: Google Local Service Ads to Automate Lead Credits
data.Description: Google Local Service Ads will automate lead credits.

data.Title: New Google Ads Report Provides Target ROAS Insights
data.Description: ICYMI: New Google Ads report for target ROAS insights for Performance Max and Standard Shopping campaigns seroundtable.com/google-ads-tro…
